page.title: 11INDUSTRIES IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Stout Brothers is a big gargage in Abernyte.It is 1 of their 3 garages in Tayside.There are 500 new cars which come in to the garage monthly & 2nd hand cars which are stored in Abernyte.Approximately 30 people work in Abernyte cleaning, selling and repairing the cars.The garage is open every day.The old church is the garage workshop and the extension has the new cars in it. People test drive cars that they like, mechanics test drive some of the cars they have repaired by driving them around Abernyte.The Milk Bar employs 5 part-time and 5 full-time workers.It attracts lots of people travelling on the A84.It sells lots of different kinds of food.There is an agricultural contractor below the Council Houses.He has 2 lorries and transports livestock for local farmers.2 men are employed.
